General.Name: Cibox Inter@ctive S.A.
General.Description: Cibox Inter@ctive develops and sells electric micro-mobility vehicles in France. The company offers electric scooters and bikes, as well as urban mobility accessories, such as helmets, knee pads, elbow pads, and hand guards. It also offers storage solutions, USB flash drives, memory cards, SSD drives, and external DVD writers. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Alfortville, France.
